pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 7, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, July 7, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Warsaw, Republic of Poland.

Canada Reception Centre
Hangar 11
190 Convair Private,
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:15 p.m.


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
